analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/37/0x83a0f2eef9157c86c393a683c99b7346d50ce4ca.sol:
	Contract MammadToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/37/0x83a0f2eef9157c86c393a683c99b7346d50ce4ca.sol#214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/37/0x83a0f2eef9157c86c393a683c99b7346d50ce4ca.sol#84) is not in mixedCase
